-- Check and create the database if it doesn't exist
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.databases WHERE name = 'AppleMusicDW')
BEGIN
    CREATE DATABASE AppleMusicDW;
END;

-- Switch to the created or existing database
USE AppleMusicDW;

-- Check and create the schema if it doesn't exist
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'table_schema')
BEGIN
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA table_schema');
END;

-- Create the external data source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE srcActivityLog
WITH 
(
    LOCATION = 'https://azuredetraining.blob.core.windows.net/' ---https://<storage acc name>.blob.core.windows.net/
);

-- Specify the external file format for Parquet
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
);

-- Create the external table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE table_schema.activity_log (
    [Correlationid] varchar(200),
    [Operationname] varchar(300),
    [Status] varchar(100),
    [Eventcategory] varchar(100),
    [Level] varchar(100),
    [Time] varchar(100),
    [Subscription] varchar(200),
    [Eventinitiatedby] varchar(1000),
    [Resourcetype] varchar(300),
    [Resourcegroup] varchar(1000),
    [Resource] varchar(2000)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'data/ActivityLog01.parquet',   -- <container name>/<file name>
    DATA_SOURCE = srcActivityLog, 
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat  -- Use the correct file format
);

-- Select from the external table
SELECT * FROM table_schema.activity_log;
